scripts.test:a11y: echo 1 && pa11y-ci --config pa11y_scripts/.p1-contact.json && echo 1-error && pa11y-ci --config pa11y_scripts/.p1-error.json && echo 2 && pa11y-ci --config pa11y_scripts/.p2-primary-issue.json && echo 2-error && pa11y-ci --config pa11y_scripts/.p2-error.json && echo 3-hatecrime && pa11y-ci --config pa11y_scripts/.p3-hatecrime.json && echo 3-commercial && pa11y-ci --config pa11y_scripts/.p3-location-commercial.json && echo 3-education && pa11y-ci --config pa11y_scripts/.p3-location-education.json && echo 3-police && pa11y-ci --config pa11y_scripts/.p3-location-police.json && echo 3-workplace && pa11y-ci --config pa11y_scripts/.p3-location-workplace.json && echo 4 && pa11y-ci --config pa11y_scripts/.p4-protected-class.json && echo 5 && pa11y-ci --config pa11y_scripts/.p5-date.json && echo 5-error && pa11y-ci --config pa11y_scripts/.p5-errors.json && echo 6 && pa11y-ci --config pa11y_scripts/.p6-details.json && echo 7 && pa11y-ci --config pa11y_scripts/.p7-review && echo 8  && pa11y-ci --config pa11y_scripts/.p8-confirmation && echo crt-view && pa11y-ci --config pa11y_scripts/.crt-view.json && echo crt-view-date && pa11y-ci --config pa11y_scripts/.crt-view-date.json && echo crt-new && pa11y-ci --config pa11y_scripts/.crt-new.json && echo privacy && pa11y-ci --config pa11y_scripts/.crt-privacy-policy.json && echo landing && pa11y-ci --config pa11y_scripts/.crt-landing.json
